net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory.mapper

Class ResourceBundleDirMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory.mapper.AbstractResourceMapper
      • net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory.mapper.ResourceBundleDirMapper

  • public class ResourceBundleDirMapper
extends AbstractResourceMapper
    Utility class to generate ResourceBundles by reading files under a certain path. Each subdir will generate a RasourceBundle that includes every file and directory below it.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceBundleDirMapper

        public ResourceBundleDirMapper(String baseDir,
                       ResourceReaderHandler rsHandler,
                       List<JoinableResourceBundle> currentBundles,
                       String resourceExtension,
                       Set<String> excludedPaths)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        baseDir - Root dir from which to define the paths.
        rsHandler - Resource handler to resolve the file structure
        currentBundles - Bundles created so far
        resourceExtension - Expected resource extension
        excludedPaths - Paths to exclude from the mappings.

    • Method Detail

      • addBundlesToMapping

        protected void addBundlesToMapping()
                            throws DuplicateBundlePathException
        Generates the resource bunles mapping expressions.
        Specified by:
        addBundlesToMapping in class AbstractResourceMapper
        Throws:
        DuplicateBundlePathException - if we try to add a bundle with a name, which already exists.
